message.body: Hi guys! I haven't seen you in a while, I miss you! I know Friday is our usual hangout time but I wondered if anybody could hang out tomorrow instead? Jay asked me to help him with something later when he's home from work...
So I found another bar and it's now on top of my list. It's called Raven Lounge. Heard of it? There are reviews of it on Yelp so look at them if you want to get a feel for it.
Eden says okay. She'll go anywhere. Sam says the place sounds cool. And Uyen said her and Steven will join us after they eat dinner together
I also got my new ID so I'm good to go.
